name: Auto Shoot
description:
You are stuck on a flying platform that changes shape over time. Your objective is to stay on it for as long as possible.

Unfortunately, you are equipped with a gun that shoots by itself and pushes you back when it does. On top of it, bombs are flying toward you! The situation is really OUT OF CONTROL!

Control:

Movement : W, A, S, D or Arrow Key
Targeting : the position of the mouse on the screen
